QuestData.Title: Bad To The Bone
QuestData.Description:
I will not leave here without killing Zulajin, or else it will just go after de next caravan dat comes through.
I have a plan, but we must work together to pull it off.
Dere are skeletal raptors roaming in de area. I do not know what voodoo brought dem here, but we need dem gone.
We are going to need as much space as possible for my plan to kill Zulajin.
